NWSA,News Ltd to sell New Zealand Sky TV stake WELLINGTON, March 4 New Zealand's dominant television operator, Sky Network Television Ltd  confirmed on Monday that its major shareholder News Corp  is to sell its 44 percent stake.

WMT,Obama to nominate Walmart's Burwell as White House budget chief -sources WASHINGTON, March 3 President Barack Obama plans to nominate Walmart Foundation head Sylvia Mathews Burwell to head the White House Office of Management and Budget on Monday, sources said on Sunday.
